name: Gary Madison
description: I have always wanted to do my part to help animals and this way I can. I have worked hard to get to where I am, and I am excited for what the future holds with this foundation.

name: Dr. Luis Miguel Figueiras Carrillo
description: I love being able to contribute to this foundation, and using my experience in the veterinarian field to give these animals the best care possible.

name: Mois√©s Garcia Palacios
description: I am so glad to be working with this foundation, and being able to learn under Dr. Figueiras. I appreciate being able to work with Gary and this foundation as well as the animals.

name: Elisa Madison
description: I am lucky to have a part in something that will help many strays and families. I look forward to seeing what this foundation can do for the community.

name: Adriana Maria Roa Figueiras
description: My love for animals is what drew me to this Foundation. This foundation brought everyone together, and I am excited to continue and watch it grow.
